title: Wellcome. We have to say: Chinese Communist Party is a liar!

replies.msg:
Hello world, welcome to LIHKG. On behalf of HongKongers, we have to say: Chinese Communist Party(CCP) is no more than a liar!

Any protocol with them is just like Sino-British Joint Declaration, which is what Chinese Communist Party (CCP) claimed "only a historical document".

Deal with CCP? Good luck!

Five Demands, Not One Less!

God damn commies
Die all commies die

The Chinese government has demonstrated that they don't honour the spirit of contract. Watch out before you sign an agreement or contract with a Chinese organisation or the Chinese government. They can "move the goalpost wherever they like" (龍門任你搬 Cantonese idiom which means changing the rules of the game whenever they want).
may the Chinese Communist Party fall!

No more chinese company in HK please, those Chinese manager treat hongkonger as slaves to service them 24 hours a day, fuck government fuck china, they are all crooks. Chinese people are still shits, they loved money very much and steal all jobs from people all over the world.
